answers.answer: Vomiting food is not a symptoms of cirrhosis. Please help him to get the immediate help he needs. Take him to an ER to find out what the cause of his vomiting is.As far as his liver disease is concerned, he should be under the care of a liver transplant center. They are the only ones who can help him with his liver disease, hepatitis C and fatty liver disease. Untreated or improperly treated cirrhosis can be fatal and need specialize medical care. The sooner the better.Good luck.Hector
